archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1105
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to be notified for certain activities irrespective of whether I have turned off notifications or not (eg - sim swap initiated, password/pin has been changed, IFP has been requested "if this was not you, please log in", so that I can be aware of fundamental changes to my account

properties.value: OOTB, notification rules can be configured that way

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
